text: community development finance authority block grant program affordable housing amend rsa i to read as follows the acquisition rehabilitation or expansion of affordable housing any housing development project funded through the program shall be limited to housing for persons with low or moderate income as defined in rsa committee established there is established a committee to study state subsidies for housing development that is not membership and compensation the members of the committee shall be as follows a three members of the house of representatives appointed by the speaker of the house of representatives b two members of the senate appointed by the president of the senate members of the committee shall receive mileage at the legislative rate when attending to the duties of the committee duties the committee shall identify state programs that subsidize housing development that is not and determine how the program can be modified to support housing development that is or otherwise designed to increase the supply of affordable housing chairperson quorum the members of the study committee shall elect a chairperson from among the members the first meeting of the committee shall be called by the house member the first meeting of the committee shall be held within days of the effective date of this section three members of the committee shall constitute a quorum report the committee shall report its findings and any recommendations for proposed legislation to the speaker of the house of representatives the president of the senate the house clerk the senate clerk the governor and the state library on or before november
